# all

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to snooze all of the tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc final var all: Bool? { get }
```

## Getting the Task Information

- **nextTriggerTime**: The next time after the current time that triggers a task to snooze.
- **tasks**: An array of tasks to snooze.
